p.d: Guest: Alain Chamfort, French singer. He was a close friend of Claude François, who had brought him to public notice, but also of Gainsbourg, Dutronc... He had known glory and groupies, but also break-ups with his record labels. A multi-facetted artist, Alain Chamfort has always successfully bounced back and now celebrates his fifty-year career. Presented by: Sébastien Folin.
